page.title: 06FARMING AROUND CAISTOR
page.content: { Manor Farm,}located on the B1205,west of Nettleton,is a 30 acre{dairy farm} with 200 cows,mostly Friesians,but there are some Guernsey.There are also 50 calves and bulls.No cash crops are grown:all the crops are used for the cattle.The work is done by 10 to 15 assistants,which includes the two families living at the farm. { Sandbreas,}in the north of the area is also a dairy farm. Other farms in the area include{Far {Farm,Water Mill Farm, Nettleton {Grange}and{Glebe Farm. However much of the land is given over to arable crops, chiefy barley, wheat, oil seed rape and potatoes. Most of the population living outside Nettleton & Caistor are {farmworkers.
